intro_text: Hi, I’m Sanrio — the owner of the Telegram channel <5>@notcloudcafe</5>, where I write original articles about the crypto market, share thoughts, and break down major news stories. The channel focuses on the <7>TON</7> blockchain, and I also run a blog on Teletype.
art_description: I'm also a digital artist. I create NFT commissions, art, designs, UI solutions, and any visual tasks. In my free time, I love drawing in Procreate.
portfolio_link: NFT collections and other works in my Telegram portfolio.
site_made_by: This site was made by me using Cursor + ChatGPT4o. If you notice bugs or want to share feedback, I'd be happy to hear from you.
channel_longread_book: Literature as the foundation of mindset.
teletype_main_link: Original articles about NFT, Telegram and Web3 on my Teletype blog
